Title: Electrifying!
Description:
You wanna help the Venture Company? And you don't mind being disposable?

Okay, listen up. When we moved in here, there were no monsters in town. But now we're finding dead workers, chewed up. It's bad for business.

Fortunately, I've got a way to make money off this: an electrocution helmet. I call it my Debugger Hat.

Take the latest model for a test run outside town. Kill the bugs. The niffen will see you, see that Debugger Hat at work, and know it's got good reviews.
ObjectivesText: "Advertise" the Debugger Hat by hitting Noth swarmites with it outside of Mmarl.
CompletionText: It oughta just kill 'em, but who knows? You might see other results, too.
RewardText:
So it had some extra effects? Great! The hype is real! What exposure! The orders will be pouring in!

You ever consider becoming a walking advertisement? Could have a bright future in making cash for me. For now, here's your wages.
